channel.title: North Powder|Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in North Powder|Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: River Lane East at US-30 East And Approaching I-84
item.description: River Lane East at US-30 East to Haines. Approaching onramp for I-84. Use I-84 east to Baker City; I-84 West/US-30 West for La Grande. OR-237 North begins at the I-84 interchange. Use OR-237 for North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West at I-84 and OR-237
item.description: US-30 west at I-84 and OR-237. US-30 joins I-84 west to La Grande. Continue straight for OR-237 and North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.
